scripts.build-web: npm run clean-web && tsc --noEmit && vite build --config ./vite.config.ts
scripts.build-electron-html: npm run clean-electron && tsc --noEmit && vite build --emptyOutDir --config ./vite.config.electron.ts
scripts.watch-electron-html: npm run clean-electron && tsc --noEmit && vite build --emptyOutDir --watch --config ./vite.config.electron.ts
scripts.build-all: npm run build-web && npm run build-electron-html
scripts.upload-production: gsutil -m cp -r ../dist/web/* gs://dicekeys.app/ & gsutil setmeta -h cache-control:no-store gs://dicekeys.app/index.html & gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" gs://dicekeys.app/assets/*.js
scripts.update-production: npm run build-app & npm run upload-production
scripts.upload-staging: gsutil -m cp -r ../dist/web/* gs://staging.dicekeys.app/ && gsutil setmeta -h cache-control:no-store gs://staging.dicekeys.app/index.html && gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" gs://staging.dicekeys.app/assets/*.js
scripts.update-staging: npm run build-web && npm run upload-staging
scripts.upload-site-association: gsutil -o "GSUtil:parallel_process_count=1" -m cp .well-known/* gs://dicekeys.app/.well-known/ && gsutil -o "GSUtil:parallel_process_count=1" -m setmeta -h "content-type: application/json" gs://dicekeys.app/.well-known/apple-app-site-association
